summary: Journalist Anne Roland explores the disturbing links behind her friend's sudden disappearance, an ominous government research chemical, and a disturbing radio broadcast of unknown origin.
cast: Katia Winter|Ted Levine|Michael McMillian|Corey Moosa|Monique Candelaria|Jenny Gabrielle|Vivian Nesbitt|Chad Brummett|William Sterchi|Alex Gianopoulos|J.D. Garfield|Kevin Wiggins|Cyd Schulte|Tone Forrest|Maud de Proost|David Midthunder|Jerome L. Williams
title: Banshee Chapter
